channel.title: uPDM4 Release Notes :: Mectric MSE Help
channel.description: uPDM4 2.0.5 02/06/2025 Bug Fixes Outputs momentarily pulsing on during power on - Fixed. Standard message frames only transmitting from default base address - Fixed. uPDM4 2.0.4 19/12/2024 Bug Fixes CAN Channel timing out in error - Fixed.
